ac: 27, touch 9, flat-footed 27 (+8 armor, +1 deflection, -1 Dex, +10 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: channel negative energy 5/day (DC 16, 4d6), might of the gods (+8, 8 rounds/day), rock throwing (120 ft.), weapon master (8 rounds/day)
other_gear: mwk chainmail, +1 battleaxe, amulet of natural armor +1, boots of the winterlands, headband of inspired wisdom +2, ring of protection +1, ring of sustenance, golden bracelets for sacred bond (2), silver unholy symbol, spell component pouch, 4,410 gp

spells.cleric spells prepared:
(CL 8th; concentration +14)

4th-blessing of fervor, communal protection from energy, divine power D, unholy blight (DC 20)

3rd-enter image, invisibility purge, magic vestment D, protection from energy, sacred bon d

2nd-align weapon, death knell (DC 18), hold person (DC 18), magic boulder *, spiritual weapon D, weapon of awe

D domain spell; Domains Strength, War

sections.body:
Before Combat A battle priest casts bull's strength, magic vestment, and protection from energy (fire) before combat, and sacred bond if her jarl is present.

During Combat The battle priest opens combat by casting divine power, then uses spells like blessing of fervor to support allies and unholy blight to harm opponents.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A frost giant battle priest uses her powers seeking out those who would undercut her authority or that of the chief, through spying on, manipulating, and threatening the rest of the tribe. When needed, she's not averse to taking up her battleaxe and splitting a few heads.

name: Frost Giant Battle Priest
skills: Climb +17, Craft (armor) +10, Intimidate +15, Knowledge (religion) +14, Perception +30, Spellcraft +7, Stealth +1 (+5 in snow)
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Frost Giants/Example Frost Giants/Frost Giant Battle Priest/Frost Giant Battle Priest
combat_gear: potions of bull's strength (2), potions of cure serious wounds (4), potions of protection from energy (2), potion of water breathing, wand of cure critical wounds (15 charges), wand of cure moderate wounds (15 charges)
